commit.message:
TimeZone.java: Sync up with Classpath.

	* java/util/TimeZone.java: Sync up with Classpath.  Includes new
	and corrected SimpleTimeZone's for the timezones hash table.

From-SVN: r40650

files.patch:

+2001-03-20  Warren Levy  <warrenl@redhat.com>
+
+	* java/util/TimeZone.java: Sync up with Classpath.  Includes new
+	and corrected SimpleTimeZone's for the timezones hash table.
+
